asset.hookText:
Subscribe to our channel:
http://bit.ly/12dY9oO

See more on this at The Petco Scoop:
http://www.petcoscoop.com/2013/12/ten-things-your-new-dog-is-trying-to-tell-you/

Bringing your new dog home means both you and your dog will need to adjust to a new way of life. But don't worry, Petco's got you covered! Check out these 10 things your new dog is trying to tell you and you'll be well equipped to care for your new animal companion.

 1. Set boundaries
 2. Make introductions
 3. Secure a collar with I.D. tag
 4. Update all vaccinations
 5. Start training immediately
 6. Slowly introduce new food
 7. Provide fresh water daily
 8. Potty train
 9. Schedule quality time
10. Be patient

Something extraordinary happens when pets and people connect. A unique bond is formed that results in something powerful, not only between pets and people, but in a way that makes the world a better place. Our promise is to nurture that relationship completely - mind and body.
